backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor exposing a healthy() query that always returns true.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining design tokens and light/dark mode color variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, social tags, favicon, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all site sections with header, health banner, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BackendHealthBan: Banner component performing a health check against the backend and showing an error notice when unreachable.
frontend/src/components/CapabilitiesSect: Section rendering categorized AI capability cards using structured capabilities content.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component that builds a mailto link, shows success feedback, and manages submission state.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders a list of FAQs using an accordion UI component. Defines static questions and answers about SentinelAI usage, security, and policies.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the hero banner with background image, headline, demo and sales buttons, and feature stats. Includes smooth scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Shows workflow steps and safe testing practices using mapped card components. Pulls structured content from howItWorks data arrays.
frontend/src/components/SafetySecuritySe: Presents detailed security features in cards and includes an important disclaimer. Lists multiple security domains with descriptions and bullet details.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and smooth‑scroll helpers. Dynamically determines the app identifier and current year.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with sticky behavior, navigation links, demo button, and a mobile menu. Supports smooth scrolling to page sections and scroll‑based styling.
frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.t: Renders a demo section with suggested prompts, a disclaimer, and a link to launch the external demo environment.
Displays a grid of industry use cases with icons, descriptions, examples, and tags.
frontend/src/content/capabilities.ts: Exports structured capability definitions including categories, descriptions, and detailed items for each feature.
frontend/src/content/howItWorks.ts: Provides workflow steps and safe testing practices for the demo environment.
frontend/src/content/tryDemo.ts: Defines suggested demo prompts and a disclaimer for safe usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes with strict government‑style aesthetics and global typography, focus, and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme utilities using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and design constraints for the Nexus Forge AI site, noting a deployment issue and pending fixes.
